uhh_lt.newsleak.writer

Class NewsleakTimeFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • uhh_lt.newsleak.writer.NewsleakTimeFormatter

  • public class NewsleakTimeFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    Extraction and formatting of dates and date ranges as annotated by HeidelTime to be used for temporal filtering in newsleak.
